code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Wishlist=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[place,setPlace]=useState('');const addItem=()=>{if(place.trim()!==''){setItems([...items,place]);setPlace('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'30px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCDD My Wishlist"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:place,placeholder:"Enter destination",onChange:e=>setPlace(e.target.value),style:{padding:'8px',width:'200px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addItem,style:{marginLeft:'10px',padding:'8px 12px'},children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{style:{listStyle:'none',marginTop:'20px',padding:0},children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["\u2728 ",item]},index))})]});};export default Wishlist;
